title: Fix ralph-ui flickering with Ink Static component
description: The live UI flickers badly and some dynamic data (iteration counter) doesn't update. Fix flickering with Ink's <Static> component and ensure ALL dynamic data reads from status file. Per docs.local/live-ui-research/round-3-agent-9-synthesis.md.

acceptanceCriteria.text: === READ RESEARCH ===
Read docs.local/live-ui-research/round-3-agent-9-synthesis.md
Understand: Static component, batching pattern, dual-stream
=== DYNAMIC DATA FROM STATUS FILE ===
Iteration counter reads from ~/.ralph-status.json (not props)
Model name reads from status file
Start time reads from status file
All dynamic values update when status file changes
=== STATIC COMPONENT ===
Wrap stable UI elements (header, borders) in <Static>
Only dynamic elements (time, progress, indicators) re-render
=== BATCHING ===
Batch state updates: 50 lines OR 100ms, whichever first
Reduce poll-triggered re-renders
=== VERIFICATION ===
Run ralph-ui while ralph runs - iteration counter updates
Model changes mid-run reflected in UI
Run ralph-ui - no visible flicker
Test with rapid file changes - still stable
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-030 fix dynamic data + eliminate UI flickering
